;How can you spot a faux Prada sneaker or Prada shoe? Number of suggestions that can support you in figuring out imitation Prada merchandise are ;??? ???????; mentioned beneath:

;&bull Shoe box: A true Prada box is made of corrugated plastic somewhat than cardboard. An additional factor is that the title of the brand name is not pointed out on the prime of the box.
